description:
Gades is the jaunty second-in-command at http://anidb.net/ch38069 [Allen]`s fort positioned on the Fanelian/Astorian border. Gades handles the seemingly impossible task of overseeing the crew of the Crusade airship. Stalwart and easy going, he can still be relied upon whenever Allen & company get into trouble.
Source: Escaflowne Wiki
name: Gades
